RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 18, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 18 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 18 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.7 ,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RONNI'S STORM away alertly, set all the pace, widened into the stretch and prevailed under strong handling. SPIN DOCTOR allowed to settle, rallied determinedly three wide through the stretch and was steadily cutting into the winners advantage late. THE MAN CAN chased the winner two wide and was outfinished. HANSENATION unhurried early, swung wide and passed tiring rivals near mid track. FOREIGN stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch then gave way. TIGER TRAIL failed to respond. BOOT LEGGER trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Spin Doctor
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, closed willingly, 3 wide, gaining, good effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Foreign
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, inside, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Ronni's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Hansenation
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, passed tiring rivals,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 47. Maiden Claiming Purse 13100. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUMP INTO SANITY prompted the pace two then three wide, surged under left handed urging through deep stretch and got up in time. SAUNTER stalked the early pace along the rail, slipped through to make the lead nearing the quarter pole, shook clear in upper stretch then couldn't handle the winner. KRISTIN set a pressured pace along the inside then two wide to the quarter pole then was outfinished. ANGEL'S DESTINY saved ground and went evenly. SOLDAT TEMPTATION offered a mild bid three wide into the turn then leveled off. DUDE'S MIST DATE had brief speed. INSIDE GIRL dwelt at the start and was never close. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Saunter
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, slipped through inside, shook clear, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Jump Into Sanity
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2-3wide, dug in, left handed urging, up in final strides,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 20800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 18 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 18 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price$16,000. $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VILLAGE CAT made the lead soon after the start, set all the pace and widened through the stretch to win as much the best while being ridden out. STARLITESLEW had her head turned at the start, raced outside, moved up three wide through the turn and finished clear for second. TV TIZ GORGEOUS saved ground and went evenly. LADY ITCH failed to menace. FRIENDLY MERGER broke in front, had speed into the turn then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Village Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, drew off, much the best, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Starliteslew
ENTRY.COMMENT: head turned start, middle move, 4 wide, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 18300. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 18 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 18 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BABA LOOEY prompted the pace two wide for a half, gained a narrow lead and wore down rivals in a game effort. WEEKEND BUZZ sped to the lead shortly after the start, set a pressured pace along the inside, dug in determinedly but couldn't handle the winner and returned bleeding from the nostrils. ACCURATE with the second flight two wide. loomed boldly three wide nearing the half mile pole then was outfinished. TIDE RISING went evenly. KARAMEL CORN had good early speed three wide then faded. NOTHINLASTSFOREVER stalked the early pace along the inside and was through after a half. PLATE IT UP trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Nothinlastsforever
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Weekend Buzz
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick lead, set pressured pace inside, held place, bled

ENTRY.NAME: Accurate
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, middle move, 3 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Baba Looey
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, wore down rivals, gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Karamel Corn
ENTRY.OWNER: Fulwiler Heather Fulwiler Richard Tieman Diane M and Hutson Bernard

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 11800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since May 18 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TURBIE pressed the pace from the start, drew on near even terms for the lead two wide past the quarter pole, was carried out to the six path by the leader, drifted in through mid stretch while under a hand ride and edged clear late under strong handling. DREAM MUSIC away alertly, set the pace along the inside, drifted to the five path entering the stretch while maintaining a narrow advantage, was forced inward passing the furlong marker giving up the lead then couldn't handle the winner. UNDERCOVER LADY stalked the pace and went evenly three wide. VAVITE allowed to settle, rallied along the inside into the stretch, was shut off causing her rider to check hard past the furlong marker then lost momentum. PLAYFUL SUMMER failed to menace. INDY LITES trailed. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND THE RIDER OF DREAM MUSIC LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF TURBIE FOR INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED TURBIE AND PLACED HER FOURTH.

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Turbie
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed, carried out 6p top lane, drifted in mid stretch, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Dream Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, drifted 5p top lane, forced in mid stretch, claim foul

ENTRY.NAME: Vavite
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, shut off past 1/8pole, checked hard

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 21900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 18 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 18 Allowed 4 lbs. Cla iming Price $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROYAL'D away alertly, sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set all the pace and maintained his advantage under right handed urging in the four path. CONDEMNATION chased the winner and finished second best in the five path. FIRSTHAND JUSTICE unhurried early, found his best stride late in the six path. JACK BE FAST went evenly. FU ROO failed to menace. GOLDEN MONEY was no threat. WORTHY OPPONENT was no factor. CANDY EXCHANGE had good early speed along the inside, suffered and injury near the seven sixteenths pole, pulled up and was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Candy Exchange
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, injured 7/16pole, pulled up, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Royal'd
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, sprinted clear, held well, 4path, right urging

ENTRY.NAME: Condemnation
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC WinStar Farm LLC and Check Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, second best, 5path, left handed urging,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since May 18 Allowed 4 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAIR AND SQUARE was hung three wide through the first turn then four wide down the backstretch, responded readily when set down to make the lead two wide entering the far turn then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best. DISTORTED LIMITS settled near the inside, angled out to the four path path the quarter pole, dropped back into the two path near mid stretch and rallied for second. PATIO PARTY away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside for nearly six and one half furlongs, shifted off the rail to the four path in mid stretch and was outfinished for second. MY BROTHER CAM failed to menace. ACROSS THE AISLE trailed into the stretch then passed tiring rivals stretch. MUGSY MALONE split horses two wide leaving the first turn, prompted the pace into the far turn then weakened. SEE SPOT RUN chased the pace two then three wide and gave way in the stretch. SAMMY'S SMILE was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Patio Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, angled out mid stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Mugsy Malone
ENTRY.COMMENT: split horses 2 wide 3/4pole, pressed, weakened 2nd turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Distorted Limits
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled 4path 1/4 pole, shifted 2p, mid stretch, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Fair and Square
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w first turn, 4w backstretch,took over 3/8 pole, much the best,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & WinStar Farm, LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 16600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 18 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Ohio Regist ered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BREEZY MONEY pressed prompted the pace three then two wide, rallied to gain a narrow advantage before the furlong marker then drew clear under right handed urging. LAZARUS PROJECT never far back, had a mild late rally two wide and got up for second. HAPPILEA broke in front, set a pressured pace two wide then along the inside to the top of the stretch and was outfinished. JACK'S ADVANTAGE well placed, failed to respond. DEBDURITE pressed the early pace along the inside and weakened in the stretch. MORE THAN GOOD hopped at the start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Lazarus Project
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, mild rally, 2 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Breezy Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, rallied 2 wide, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: More Than Good
ENTRY.OWNER: Poole Joseph M and McCall Richard H

ENTRY.NAME: Happilea
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace inside, outfinished
